definitions.definition: To lower , as in condition in life , office , rank , etc., so as to cause pain or hurt feelings ; to degrade , to depress , to humble , to humiliate .
To lower physically ; to depress ; to cast or throw down; to stoop .
To lower in value , in particular by altering the content of alloys in coins ; to debase .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To lower , as in condition in life , office , rank , etc., so as to cause pain or hurt feelings ; to degrade , to depress , to humble , to humiliate . [from c. 1350–1470]
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , archaic ) To lower physically ; to depress ; to cast or throw down; to stoop . [from c. 1350–1470]
( transitive , obsolete ) To lower in value , in particular by altering the content of alloys in coins ; to debase . [from mid 16th – mid 18th c.]
